room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by MindQuest Escape Games in West Palm Beach
room_address: 103 US Hwy 1, Unit C1, Jupiter FL 33477
room_description: The Star of Dreams Diamond has been stolen! Montgomery Bank & Trust is a known front for money laundering and other criminal activity. We have reliable intel that indicates the Star of Dreams is secured somewhere on their premises, presumably under the watchful eye of the bank's president, Charles Montgomery, III. It's up to you to break into Montgomery's office, locate his secret vault and confiscate the diamond before he returns. We need your help to ensure the Star of Dreams is recovered by its rightful owner!
